A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For the \"middle movie\"- pretty awesome. what you think should happen? Maybe it won't... maybe it did. Unexpected outcomes\, unexpected characters\, old story lines and archetypal ingredients that came across as new... twists that flip your ego on its head...  And finally\, unexpected underlying themes that leave wide open new horizons for the Star Wars storyline. Bottom line\, I cried\, I laughed\, I held my breath. I'm just a little fan since a girl and I need to see this one again.
